name: Mindfuture World
slogan: We connect global brands with live streaming
description:
Mindfuture World is the leading global sports and esports ad-tech marketing company. 
We serve independent and Fortune 500 brands and work with global influencers for our performance marketing campaigns.
Our Customers Include Betway, Samsung, Coca-Cola, SONY, Nestle, L'oreal & Many More Brands…
We are an incredibly fast paced digital company, driven by the passion for creating this new chapter of the Esports entertainment history. We value independent minds, initiative and start-up mindset. We give quickly responsibilities and opportunities, with us you really can be somebody and have a positive impact.
We are a privately held company headquartered in London.

team.name: Monika Wisniewska

jobs.title: Digital Marketing Manager
jobs.description:
We connect brands with the future for over a decade now. We are highly experienced and dedicated global dream team who believe that the ESPORT is the future of entertainment and advertising.

Our mission is also our core business:we actively connect with best people and best brands while empowering them to be even more successful. We put people at the heart of our business.

The new opportunity has just arrived :Digital Marketing Manager !

If you have passion for gaming, ESPORT, performance marketing, join our TEAM.

Job Responsibilities:

Develops digital marketing strategy by studying economic indicators, tracking changes in supply and demand, identifying customers and their current and future needs, and monitoring the competition.
Plans and executes all web, SEO/SEM, database marketing, email, social media, and display advertising campaigns.
Designs, builds, and maintains our social media presence.
Contributes to marketing effectiveness by identifying short-term and long-range issues that must be addressed.
Measures and reports performance of all digital marketing campaigns and assesses against goals (ROI and KPIs).
Identifies trends and insights, and optimizes spend and performance based on the insights.
Brainstorms new and creative growth strategies through digital marketing.
Plans, executes, and measures experiments and conversion tests.
Collaborates with internal teams to create landing pages and optimize user experience.
Utilizes strong analytical ability to evaluate end-to-end customer experience across multiple channels and customer touch points.
Identifies critical conversion points and drop off points and optimizes user funnels.
Completes digital marketing department operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees and following up on work results.
Maintains digital marketing staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees.
Maintains digital marketing staff job results by counseling and disciplining employees; and planning, monitoring, and appraising job results.
Develops digital marketing staff by providing information, educational opportunities, and experiential growth opportunities.
Digital Marketing Manager Qualifications/Skills:

Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform, and motivate
Creating and maintaining client relationships
Coaching and subordinate involvement
Managing processes
Self-motivated yet customer-focused
Proficient in marketing research and statistical analysis
Able to develop budgets
Familiar with financial planning and strategy
Education, Experience, and Licensing Requirements:

Bachelor’s or master’s degree in marketing or a related field
Proven working experience in digital marketing, particularly within the industry
Demonstrable experience leading and managing SEO/SEM, marketing database, email, social media, and/or display advertising campaigns
Experience in optimizing landing pages and user funnels
Experience with A/B and multivariate experiments
Solid knowledge of website and marketing analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, NetInsight, Omniture, WebTrends, SEMRush, etc.)
Working knowledge of ad serving tools
Experience in setting up and optimizing PPC campaigns on all major search engines
Working knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript development and constraints
We offer:

Young, dynamic and international environment

Permanent contract, salary+ bonuses+ rewards

Industry: Internet and Software/ Marketing/ SAS

Reference ID: marketing

jobs.title: GLOBAL SALES DIRECTOR -REMOTE
jobs.description:
Mindfuture World is the leading global sports and esports ad-tech marketing company. We serve independent and Fortune 500 brands.

We are an incredibly fast paced digital company, driven by the passion for creating this new chapter of the Esports entertainment history. We value independent minds, initiative and start-up mindset. We give quickly responsibilities and opportunities, with us you really can be somebody and have a positive impact.

We are a privately held company headquartered in London with the offices in Slough (The Future Works) and  in Krakow (Poland).

**Summary:**

As a GLOBAL SALES DIRECTOR you will actively working on developing key accounts (B2B , GLOBAL BLUECHIP BRANDS) and a pipeline of a new business. GENERATING LEADS, PRESENTING OFFERS TO HIGH LEVEL EXECUTIVES.

We are looking for a with strong communication skills, self-drive and an entrepreneurial spirit with the passion for gaming.

Requirements

A WIDE experience in networking, relationships management, mobile gaming, and/or ad-tech companies in an Account Management role or sales.
Ability to grasp complex data structures, investigate them, model them, and present them
Ability to present complex data solution in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audiences, including non-technical
Self-starting attitude, great written and verbal communication skills, and attention to detail
Strong understanding of the esports and/or gaming ecosystem
Strong proficiency with spreadsheet technologies (MS Excel, Google Spreadsheet)
An insatiable thirst for knowledge + learning
Enjoy working in small, fast-paced teams where you can take initiative and accountability, and generate - results every day
Extra Credit:
Innate curiosity, desire to learn all parts of the business from engineering to product to sales.
BA, BS or Master’s Degree in a marketing or similar
We offer : HIGH CAPTIVE EARNINGS (100,000 GBP+) + BONUSES, HIGH COMMISSION (UNCAPPTED)
Join our team in the Future Works office building in commercial Slough, London and make a real contribution to something big.

jobs.title: Influencer Manager Gaming
jobs.description:
Are You a Gamer? Do you want to join a global full service esport agency and contribute to something BIG? Join us now.

Mindfuture World is the leading global sports and esports ad-tech marketing company. 

We serve independent and Fortune 500 brands and work with global influencers for our performance marketing campaigns.

Our Customers Include Betway, Samsung, Coca-Cola, SONY, Nestle, L'oreal & Many More Brands…

We are an incredibly fast paced digital company, driven by the passion for creating this new chapter of the Esports entertainment history. We value independent minds, initiative and start-up mindset. We give quickly responsibilities and opportunities, with us you really can be somebody and have a positive impact.

We are a privately held company headquartered in London.

Summary:

As a Relationship Manager for the ESPORT and GAMING, you will actively working on developing key accounts (a pipeline of users) and repeat business.

You will be part of an existing eight-person Account Management team. We are looking for someone with strong communication skills, self-drive and an entrepreneurial spirit with the passion for gaming.

Requirements

2-5 years of experience in gaming, mobile gaming, esport
Experience in the gaming industry is a must.
Ability to grasp complex data structures, investigate them, model them, and present them
Ability to present complex data solution in a clear and concise manner to a variety of audiences, including non-technical
Self-starting attitude, great written and verbal communication skills, and attention to detail
Strong understanding of the esports and/or gaming ecosystem
Strong proficiency with spreadsheet technologies (MS Excel, Google Spreadsheet)
An insatiable thirst for knowledge + learning
Enjoy working in small, fast-paced teams where you can take initiative and accountability, and generate - results every day
Extra Credit

Expertise and passion for the gaming ecosystem
Innate curiosity, desire to learn all parts of the business from engineering to product to sales.
BA, BS or Master’s Degree in a marketing or similar
Why Mindfuture ?

We have a birds-eye view of the entire esport ecosystem, and we keep our teams constantly abreast of the latest trends, news, and best practices.
You align with our Core Values: Customer-Focused, Innovative, Continuously Learning, Action-Oriented, Respectful, Data & Metrics-Driven.
We grant options to all of our employees because we recognize that everybody plays an integral role in our success;
We offer : competitive salary, rewards for outstanding results, incentives, coaching and mentoring sessions, attendance to the ESPORT events.

Apply today.
